analysis.description:
DBXTTest2ICO.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#284-296) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- DT.balanceOf(_sender) == 0
	- DT.balanceOf(this) == 0

DBXTTest2ICO.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#278-284) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-DT.transfer(beneficiary,DT.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#280-282)

DBXTTest2ICO.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#284-296) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-DT.transfer(_sender,dtCount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol)

Reentrancy in DBXTTest2ICO.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#284-296):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(DT.balanceOf(this) >= dtCount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#293-294)
	- DT.balanceOf(_sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol)

Reentrancy in DBXTTest2ICO.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#284-296):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(DT.balanceOf(this) >= dtCount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#293-294)
	- DT.balanceOf(_sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol)
	- DT.transfer(_sender,dtCount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol)

Reentrancy in DBXTTest2ICO.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#278-284):
	External calls:
	- DT.transfer(beneficiary,DT.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#280-282)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/31/0x4fcffdb1b6ec0ef15117699e347f34ab4f90bab3.sol#282)
